title: Coconut Estate in Madamulana Weeraketiya
details:
Coconut estate available in Madamulana Weeraketiya for outright sale. The property is faced to a tarred road -hence with container access. Therefore this is ideal for any commercial purpose or coconut related purpose such as a coir mill,etc.
This property is even suitable for a Real Estate company for blocking out. Approximately 560 perches available with an on- going house .
Serious parties only, no brokers or time wasters entertained
